Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 67th overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1970...
Injured on 8/10/1971 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 8/22/1972 with a Torn Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for full season...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Pontiac on 2/5/1974 (Going to PON: 1B S. Camara, RF A. Steppe. Going to PIL: P D. Muldoon)...
Had first career hit on 4/7/1975, off Adrian Montoya (WT)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1975, off Palmer Hamman (LYN)...
Drove in 6 runs against Capital City on 5/8/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1977, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Halifax on 6/16/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1979, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Coney Island on 8/23/1980...
Drove in 6 runs against Diablo on 4/30/1981...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1981, hitting .360 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1981, hitting .448 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1983, hitting .519 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
